Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializer("Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.WebForms.WebFormCodeDomSerializer, Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web, Version=10.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.TypeCodeDomSerializer, System.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 表示從裝載 ASP.NET Web 應用程式的伺服器要求的 .ascx 檔案 (也稱為使用者控制項)。

span.span: Represents an .ascx file, also known as a user control, requested from a server that hosts an ASP.NET Web application.

summary.span: 此檔案必須從 Web Forms 網頁呼叫，否則會發生剖析器錯誤。

span.span: The file must be called from a Web Forms page or a parser error will occur.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是與具有.ascx 副檔名的檔案相關聯。The class is associated with files that have .ascx extensions. 這些檔案會在執行階段做為編譯物件，並在伺服器記憶體中快取。These files are compiled at run time as objects and cached in server memory. 您可以藉由宣告一個.ascx 檔案中另一個包含後者 Web Forms 網頁中使用巢狀使用者控制項。You can nest user controls by declaring one .ascx file in another including the latter in a Web Forms page. 使用者控制項包含在 ASP.NET Web Form 網頁，並提供 Web 開發人員輕鬆地擷取常用的 Web UI。User controls are contained in ASP.NET Web Forms pages, and offer Web developers an easy way to capture commonly used Web UI. 它們是具現化，方式類似於快取物件。They are instantiated and cached in ways similar to objects. 不同於頁面，不過，使用者控制項，無法呼叫獨立。Unlike pages, however, user controls cannot be called independently. 它們只可以從網頁或其他使用者控制項，其中包含這些呼叫。They can only be called from the page or other user control that contains them. 如果您想要建立使用者控制項，使用程式碼後置項技術，請衍生自這個類別。Derive from this class if you want to create a user control using the code-behind technique. 這被建議如果您正在開發使用這項技術的 Web Form 頁面。This is recommended if you are developing Web Forms pages using this technique. 以宣告方式建立使用者控制項的相關資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 使用者控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5e601b3d-bb16-4dbe-9e35-7e92a34565ca)。For information about creating user controls declaratively, see [ASP.NET User Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5e601b3d-bb16-4dbe-9e35-7e92a34565ca). ## Examples 在下列範例中，定義的類別`SimpleControl`，會繼承類別，並可用來當做 ASP.NET 程式碼後置類別。The class defined in the following example, `SimpleControl`, inherits the class and can be used as an ASP.NET code-behind class. 它會使用， ，並Web 伺服器控制項，並定義`myButton_Click`方法，用於指派屬性值，以及兩個字串，為屬性。It uses the , , and Web server controls and defines a `myButton_Click` method that assigns the property value, along with two strings, to the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl/CS/simplecontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl/VB/simplecontrol.vb#2)] 下列範例是包含在.ascx 檔案中的標記。The following example is markup contained in an .ascx file. 您可以使用`SimpleControl`定義上一個範例中，為這個.ascx 檔案中的標記程式碼後置類別的類別。You can use the `SimpleControl` class defined in the previous example as a code-behind class for the markup in this .ascx file. [!code-aspx-csharp[Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl/CS/simpleformcs.ascx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl/VB/simpleformvb.ascx#3)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常不建立的執行個體類別。You do not typically create an instance of the class. 若要建立您自己的使用者控制項，繼承自類別。To create your own user control, inherit from the class. 若要以程式設計方式建立新的使用者控制項，ASP.NET 網頁上，使用方法。To create a new user control on an ASP.NET page programmatically, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會將兩個機碼值組，如果相關聯的使用者控制項的應用程式狀態的使用者控制項的屬性會傳回`false`。The following example adds two key value pairs to the application state associated with a user control if the user control's property returns `false`. 當符合此條件時，程式碼會使用方法，透過使用者控制項的屬性，若要新增之索引鍵和其值。When this condition is met, the code uses the method, through the user control's property, to add the keys and their values. summary.span: 取得 物件，這個物件與包含使用者控制項的應用程式關聯。

span.span: Gets the object that is associated with the application that contains the user control.

value.span: 存放使用者控制項資料的 物件。

span.span: The object in which to store the user control's data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓您儲存資料供日後擷取，並會在應用程式之間共用。The allows you to store data for later retrieval, and is shared across the application. 您所儲存的資料與目前的網頁或使用者工作階段無關。The data that you store is independent of the current page or user session. 透過這個屬性，以提高網頁或應用程式的效能，如果建立資料存取資料速度很慢。Access data through this property to boost page or application performance if creating the data is slow. 如需使用快取的詳細資訊，請參閱[快取應用程式資料](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/206f977d-7860-4d20-bdd5-c3b3d8479f3d)。For more information about using the Cache, see [Caching Application Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/206f977d-7860-4d20-bdd5-c3b3d8479f3d). ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性，以便存放屬性值Web 伺服器控制項`txtValue`，請在使用者控制項的應用程式相關聯的物件。The following example uses the property to store the property value of a Web server control, `txtValue`, in the object associated with the user control's application. 它會使用屬性，若要這樣做，此項目索引鍵參數將值指派為`txtName.Text`。It uses the property to do so, assigning the item a key parameter value of `txtName.Text`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[Classic Cache.this Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.this Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.this Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.this Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得這個使用者控制項之快取參數集合的參考。

value.span: ，包含會定義這個 之快取參數的屬性。

span.span: A containing properties that define the caching parameters for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會定義執行個體的快取參數類別。The property defines the cache parameters for the instance of the class. 屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以在這裡設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 不能以宣告方式設定屬性。The property cannot be set declaratively. 它必須以程式設計方式設定。It must be set programmatically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷是否可快取使用者控制項，以及如果是的話，設定屬性設為 10 秒快取的控制。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether the user control can be cached, and if so, sets the property to cache the control for 10 seconds. [!code-aspx-csharp[UserControlCachePolicy#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControlCachePolicy/CS/usercontrolcachepolicycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[UserControlCachePolicy#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControlCachePolicy/VB/usercontrolcachepolicyvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫方法期間`Page_Init`要求處理階段。The following example calls the method during the `Page_Init` stage of request processing. 這讓使用者控制使用 RAD 設計工具這類[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]。This makes the user control available to a RAD designer such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]. summary.span: 因為在網頁和使用者控制項之間有一些差異，這個方法確定使用者控制項會適當的初始化。

span.span: Since there are some differences between pages and user controls, this method makes sure that the user control is initialized properly.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫方法期間`Page_Init`要求處理階段。The following example calls the method during the `Page_Init` stage of request processing. 在此情況下它初始化自 page 本身，但您可以將它初始化從另一個控制項，並傳遞屬性所包含的網頁，為此方法的參數值。In this case it is initialized from the page itself, but you could initialize it from another control and pass the property value of the containing page as the parameter for this method. [!code-csharp[UserControl_Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControl_Properties/CS/usercontrol_properties.cs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[UserControl_Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControl_Properties/VB/usercontrol_properties.vb.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void LoadViewState (object savedState);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void LoadViewState(object savedState) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub LoadViewState (savedState As Object)
protected: override void LoadViewState(System::Object ^ savedState);
override this.LoadViewState : obj -> unit

param.name: savedState
param.span: ，代表所要還原的使用者控制項狀態。

span.span: An that represents the user control state to be restored.

summary.span: 從 方法所儲存的先前使用者控制項要求來還原檢視狀態資訊。

span.span: Restores the view-state information from a previous user control request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定的自訂伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 您可以載入檢視狀態的值欄位，讓您不必擷取從屬性更新版本。You can load a view-state value into a field so that you do not have to retrieve it from the property later. 您也可以將這個值插入屬性之前呼叫，這是有效的方式將欄位設為整個伺服器的來回行程期間保存下來。You can also insert the value into the property just before calling , which is an effective way to make a field persist across round trips to the server. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何管理其檢視狀態使用的使用者控制項和方法。The following example demonstrates a user control that manages its view state using the and methods. [!code-csharp[UserControl_StateManagement#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControl_StateManagement/CS/usercontrol2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[UserControl_StateManagement#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControl_StateManagement/VB/usercontrol2.vb#1)]

summary.span: 將虛擬的檔案路徑 (絕對或相對) 指派給實體檔案路徑。

span.span: Assigns a virtual file path, either absolute or relative, to a physical file path.
The physical path to the file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類似於 while方法，這個方法會將對應從.ascx 檔案的位置，不將.aspx 檔案的位置路徑。While similar to the method, this method maps the path from the .ascx file's location, not the .aspx file's location. 您可以使用這個方法來取得的映像的目錄路徑，或使用相關聯的其他資源您物件。You can use this method to obtain a path to a directory of images or other resources associated with your object. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫方法來建立關聯`actualServerPath`變數的使用者控制項，名為相關聯的實體路徑`myControl`。The following example calls the method to associate an `actualServerPath` variable with the physical path associated with the user control named `myControl`. [!code-csharp[UserControl1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControl1/CS/usercontrol1.cs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[UserControl1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControl1/VB/usercontrol1.vb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個方法，以通知必須執行才能建立並設定執行個體的任何初始化步驟。When notified by this method, the must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 這個方法會確認站台資訊與相關聯執行個體，並可確保此類別會正確地初始化為物件。This method confirms site information associated with the instance and ensures that the class is initialized correctly as a object. 在這個階段的使用者控制項的生命週期中，控制項的檢視狀態尚未填入。In this stage of the user control's lifecycle, the control's view state has yet to be populated. 此外，您無法存取其他伺服器控制項，呼叫這個方法時，無論它是子網域或此控制項的父代。Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control. 其他伺服器控制項不一定是已建立並準備好進行存取。Other server controls are not certain to be created and ready for access.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性，以取得使用者控制項的實體路徑。The following example uses the property to obtain the physical path of the user control. 具有屬性設定為`myControl`、 所包含的頁面會取得使用者控制項的位置，或使用的使用者控制`myControl.Request.Path`語法。With an property set to `myControl`, the user control's location is obtained by a containing page or user control using the `myControl.Request.Path` syntax. summary.span: 儲存任何使用者控制項檢視狀態的變更，這些變更是自最後一次網頁回傳後發生的。

span.span: Saves any user control view-state changes that have occurred since the last page postback.

returns.span: 傳回使用者控制項的目前檢視狀態。

span.span: Returns the user control's current view state.

returns.span: 如果沒有與控制項相關的檢視狀態，則傳回 。

span.span: If there is no view state associated with the control, it returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般情況下，您不需要呼叫這個方法。In general, you do not need to call this method. 不過，如果您儲存檢視狀態中的自訂資訊時，您可以覆寫這個方法來執行這項操作。However, if you store custom information in view state, you can override this method to do so. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何管理其檢視狀態使用的使用者控制項和方法。The following example demonstrates a user control that manages its view state using the and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 追蹤會追蹤，並提供關於 Web 要求的執行詳細資料。Tracing tracks and presents the execution details about a Web request. 在呈現的網頁中顯示的追蹤資料，您必須啟用該網頁的追蹤。For trace data to be visible in a rendered page, you must enable tracing for that page. 根據預設，已停用頁面追蹤。By default, page tracing is disabled. 若要啟用頁面的追蹤，請使用[@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4)指示詞，如下所示： \<%@ 網頁追蹤 ="true"的 %>To enable tracing for a page, use the [@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4) directive as follows: \<%@ Page trace="true" %>

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法必須從叫用控制項的資料作業方法內使用`ModelType`進行資料繫結的屬性。The method must be invoked from inside a data-operation method of the control by using the `ModelType` property for data binding.
